title: Best of The Program | Guest: Charlie Kirk | 4/21/20
description:
In today’s coronavirus update, President Trump tweeted that he will temporarily suspend immigration – something 8 in 10 Americans wanted. Meat prices could soon rise, Facebook labels the pages of shutdown protests as “misinformation,” and a coronavirus crime wave may be coming. Turning Point USA founder and president Charlie Kirk breaks down the latest leftist hypocrisy toward protesters. Oil prices dropped below zero for the first time in history! Glenn explains how this could happen and the deflation that’s on the horizon.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
